member.name: DML_GRAPH_NODE_DESC
member.summary: A generic container for a node within a graph of DirectML operators defined by and passed to .

member.name: DML_GRAPH_NODE_DESC.Type
member.summary: The type of graph node. See for available types.

member.name: DML_GRAPH_NODE_DESC.Desc
member.summary: A pointer to the graph node description. The type of the pointed-to struct must match the value specified in Type.
